about_the_game:
Dive into non-stop action in a movement-based arena shooter, blending some of the most familiar gameplay elements of the genre, into a completely new experience.

Play against your friends and see which of you has the best aim and movement. Collect and unlock new items to personalize your character and your loadout. Each weapon in this game has a distinct playstyle, setting them apart from one another. MechDrachen shines with many classic shooter elements such as health packs, loadouts, rapid movement, short TTK (time to kill) and minimal respawn times. The game is an experience, that was build around continuous gameplay. The main focus of the game is fast paste movement and aim based combat. As rewards for playing the game, you can receive cosmetic items to create a unique look. The game aims to achieve a fun adrenalin rush for you and your friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Dive into non-stop action in a movement-based arena shooter, blending some of the most familiar gameplay elements of the genre into a completely new experience, build around the idea to have the most fun with your friends you could possibly have with a movement shooter.
